## Quaternion.RotationAxis() method

Creates a quaternion from a rotation around an axis

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static RotationAxis(axis: Vector3, angle: number): Quaternion;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  axis | <code>Vector3</code> | defines the axis to use |
|  angle | <code>number</code> | defines the angle to use (in Euler degrees) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Quaternion`

a new quaternion created from the given axis (Vector3) and angle in radians (float)
